application.name: 金表数据
application.description: 金表数据是一个高效的表单制作工具
application.author: 微赞

manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_cjwy_survey` ( `sid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `uniacid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `thumb` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `description` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `content` text, `stime` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `etime` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `success_info` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `max_num` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `num` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `hdp` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bgpic` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `copyright` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `copyrighturl` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sharetitle` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `sharepic` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sharedesc` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `created` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `credit` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `coupon` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`sid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_cjwy_survey_answer` ( `said` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `sid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `uniacid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `sqid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `openid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `uid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `content` text, `created` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`said`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_cjwy_survey_question` ( `sqid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `uniacid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `sid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `description` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `extra` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `is_must` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1', `is_show` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1', `rule` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `defvalue` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sort` smallint(5) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `created` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`sqid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;
